text: Shirley Annette Ballas (n√©e Rich, formerly Stopford; born 6 September 1960) is an English ballroom dancer, dance teacher, and dance judge. ==Dancing== She works in the International Latin division. It is where she won multiple championship titles earning her the nickname The Queen of Latin. In 2016, Ballas was appointed as a head judge on the BBC One celebrity dancing show Strictly Come Dancing following the retirement of Len Goodman.
